page.title: 07Social Survey/Gt.Walding.
page.content: In a survey of which 35 people took part.Most people lived in a house built after 1945.They were mostly on the Alan Reason Estate. Detached houses just came first with semi-detached houses a close second. Only about 1 or 2 children lived in bungalows,terraced and farm houses. It seemed most people enjoyed living in Great Waldingfield.They said the people were friendly, there were good walks and lovely countryside.The people who disliked living there said that it was boring with no facilities and nothing to do. When asked in what way they would like to see a change they suggested:a cricket pitch,more discos,tennis courts, swimming pool,more shops & BMX tracks. At the time of writing an indoor bowling green has been bought for the elder residents of the village.
